org.smtlib.sexpr

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.smtlib.Utils
      • org.smtlib.sexpr.Utils

  • public class Utils
extends Utils
    Holds constants and utility methods pertinent to the S-expression concrete implementation of the SMT-LIB syntax.

      • loadLogic

        public IResponse loadLogic(ILogic logicExpr,
                  SymbolTable symTable)
        This version of loadLogic loads a logic as defined in the logicExpr expression, if it is a valid definition of a logic.
        Overrides:
        loadLogic in class Utils
        Parameters:
        logicExpr - the ILogic object to check and load
        symTable - the symbol table into which to load the ids defined by the logic
        Returns:
        null (if all is well) or error responses

      • loadTheory

        public IResponse loadTheory(ITheory theory,
                   SymbolTable symTable)
        This version of loadTheory loads a theory into the symbol table, as defined in the theory expression, if it is a valid definition of a logic.
        Overrides:
        loadTheory in class Utils
        Parameters:
        theory - the theory object to load
        symTable - the symbol table into which to load the ids defined by the theory
        Returns:
        null (if all is well) or an error response

      • asSort

        public ISort asSort(ISexpr sexpr,
           SymbolTable symtab)
        Interprets an ISexpr as a Sort, returns null if not a Sort (no error messages are logged).
        Parameters:
        sexpr - the ISexpr to interpret
        symtab - the symbol table to use for symbol lookup
        Returns:
        null or the corresponding Sort
